item.title: Report X-2024072084
item.description:
Report X-2024072084

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-29T09:15:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-19
  • City: EARTH CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT APPROXIMATELY 20:45 THE SUPERVISOR FROM THE PD 11 CALLED THE DMP CAGE TO INFORM THAT THERE WAS A LEAKING HAZMAT IN DOOR 112. A DESIGNATED RESPONDER DONNING PROPER PPE ARRIVED ON SCENE WITH A FULLY STOCKED SPILL CART. UPON ENTERING THE TRAILER THEY DISCOVERED A LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE LYING ON ITS SIDE. AFTER REFERRING TO THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET THEY ACTED ACCORDINGLY. THE PACKAGE WAS TRANSPORTED BACK TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON OPENING THE SINGLEWALL FIBREBOARD BOX IT WAS DETERMINED THE CAUSE OF THE LEAKAGE WAS A LOOSE CAP. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN DISPOSED OF ACCORDING TO THE DMP FLOW CHART AND PROPER APPENDIX.

item.title: Report X-2024071963
item.description:
Report X-2024071963

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-26T18:15:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-18
  • City: EARTH CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER TOOK A PHONE CALL FROM SUPIVISER ON SD 1-2 TO RESPOND TO A LEAKING HAZMAT AT DOOR 106. AFTER DONNING GEAR, RESPONDER TOOK PUSHCART TO DOOR 106. THE BOX WAS ON THE GROUND. THE RESPONDER USED THE DECISION TREE AND AFTER LOOKING AT THE BOX SAW THAT IT WAS A CORROSIVE. USING SODIUM BICARBONATE TO NEUTRALIZE SPILL ON FLOOR. TAKING THE BOTTLES ON THE SLIDE AND PUT THEM IN A SPILL LINED TREY. CLEANED UP SPILL ON FLOOR AND TOOK SOURCE BOX AND CONTAMINATED BOXES TO DMP CAG FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024071769
item.description:
Report X-2024071769

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-25T15:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-20
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Austin Rechtermann, 003 Operations Supervisor, contacted Safety regarding a UN1814, Potassium Hydroxide Solution spill on the trailer floor. Austin advised while unloading trailer 504561 the spill was noticed. Austin stated the carton appeared to had been damaged in transit. Austin advised the spill is contained to the trailer floor. Austin stated he would send photos to Safety of the spill. Safety contacted Kim with Cura for remediation.
